snippet.title: Death Elevator - Announcement Trailer (Consoles)
snippet.description:
The minimalist roguelike where you die in a single shot is now coming to consoles!

The game releases on November 28th (2024) and you can find it on your favourite platform on the links below:

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2485080/Death_Elevator/
 
- Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/pt-br/games/store/death-elevator/9mz1814s9jq8

- Nintendo: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/death-elevator-switch/

- Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/pt-br/concept/10010560/

Reach the top floor or die trying!
